website_summaries.verdict: Salomon has created another likable product in the X Ultra 3 Mid Aero. This trail hiker was appreciated for its comfy confines and supportive build. Those who are looking for a quick-drying mid-top boot will surely like this offering. It, however, failed to satisfy everyone. All in all, the X Ultra 3 Mid Aero from Salomon is an outdoor gear that can live up to the demands of the outdoors.
pros: The Salomon X Ultra 3 Mid Aero earned numerous praises for its comfortable feel
A small number of wearers liked its supportive build
This Salomon boot for hiking was liked by the majority for its excellent fit
Many online buyers commented that they were stoked with the X Ultra 3 Mid Aero’s ability to dry quickly
Its breathability pleased a considerable number of wearers
According to several online buyers, the outsole of this over-the-ankle hiker was undoubtedly grippy
Its no break-in period delighted a handful of users
cons: A couple of verified purchasers didn’t like the top eyelet because it gets hooked to the other boot

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding hiking boot
customer_reviews.text: A.T. hiker, will have worn these boots from the last 60 miles of VA, all of WV, MD, PA, NJ, NY, CT, MA and the first 100 miles of VT when I replace them in 90 miles. The pictures are their condition after 659 miles. I have already had to replace the SuperFeet insoles once. Simply put, these are excellent boots and I've ordered another pair to replace them. Wish I started with them. They dry out quickly, protect very well from rocks and are comfortable. Update: Finished my hike with the 2nd pair. Strong winds on a cool day were felt by my feet & almost got cold. That's how breathable these shoes are.
customer_reviews.author: kayak42

customer_reviews.title: Nice warm weather hiking and all around mid height boot
customer_reviews.text: I got these to use in the spring, summer, and early fall months for hiking and general use. I have Salomon Quest 4 3D GTX boots and love those, and wear them in the colder weather. Was looking for a mid-length boot that was a bit lighter, cooler, and quicker to lace up for the warmer weather and think these are perfect. They are a bit lighter than the Quest 4 but much easier to lace up and feel cooler on my feet. Great grip and sole, and very comfortable. They did not need a break in like my Quest 4's did. If you need waterproof versions, there is a GTX model.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great hiking boot with excellent ankle support
customer_reviews.text: Had these for a few few weeks. I added two things to make them perfect. Kiwi Never tie again shoestring no tie laces (just used the clamp helps them the laces stay tight and do not have to keep retying) and added a pair of insoles as I have a high arch. I finished a 17 mile hike today. No blisters, no real foot pain. They grip very well when going up hills or climbing on rocks. I highly recommend it. It is really a great investment in your feet and will let you hike further and over more rugged areas.
customer_reviews.author: Mac Geek

customer_reviews.title: Shoe slightly undersized
customer_reviews.text: My foot size is 12.5. I ordered a 13. I need to use an orthopedic insert. With the insert, the shoe is too small. Even with the shoe's standard insert, it's a very snug fit. I haven't had this problem with other shoes. Suggest you order 1/2 size larger than normal if you need to add an insert of any kind.,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good if you don't need extra stability built in.
customer_reviews.text: A little long and narrow, outsole is quite narrow, not providing a strong base for arch support. 14 mile hike in the mountains, arches rolling inward some. Minimal insoles don't help, replaced with an Oboz insole which is much better. Thin, flexible midsole has good and bad points. Best breathing, fastest drying shoe I have. Wet traction seems to be acceptable, maybe better than average while still reasonably durable.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe/Boot
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these to wear in Afghanistan and the wind gets through the material to keep my feet from sweating. Fits so good, I will definitely order more Salomon products.
customer_reviews.author: Ray R

customer_reviews.title: Best hot weather boot
customer_reviews.text: 28+ years of hiking, 13+ years in the military, these are the best hot weather, non-waterproof boot I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: It's a pleasure to find a shoe that fits and works perfectly - and for me this is it. It's not waterproof or warm, but I needed a shoe for desert hiking and this is perfect. Lightweight, airy and well padded. I'm buying a second pair to store in case they ever discontinue this model.
customer_reviews.author: Shogun

customer_reviews.title: Breathes
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a lightweight breathable "boot" and this fits the bill. Normally wear an 11.5 Salomon and this in a 12 is great. very meshy and great for hot weather.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Moffatt

customer_reviews.title: Swiched from Murrells to Salomon, never looked back.
customer_reviews.text: They are the best, I own like three pair. This is a great price for a very durable boot. Lightweight and does the job that you need it to do. When muddy, I just hit them with a water hose while I'm wearing them and they are right as rain. Anyway, If you purchase you wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Nice boot but runs small
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband but had to return them as they ran about a full size too small. I will say the construction of this boot was quite nice and appeared as though it would be quite sturdy. Also, a very nice looking style.
customer_reviews.author: Babchia

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Tight Fit:
customer_reviews.text: I typically wear size 10.5, but buy 11 in hiking boots to allow room for thicker socks. The Salomon boots feel more narrow than any other boots I've had, plus toe box is extremely tight. Other than that, they are quality boots. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Bru-sky

customer_reviews.title: Bottom line great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe been wearing Salomons for years. The venting system is excellent when the wind blows you can feel it on your feet with these shoes on. The contigrip is ultra sticky and provides excellent traction on or off the trail. Bottom line if your an active person indoors or out get them.
customer_reviews.author: Ground pounder

customer_reviews.title: Great boot, Really bad sole.
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable no break in required. Stoked to find a pair of shoes that breathe are lightweight yet stiff enough to support properly. What SUCKS! These boots were bought July 16 2020. See photos to see what 3-5 miles a day has done to soles. Yes I have a heavy stride but I weigh 170 and have never killed a pair of high end boots so quickly!
customer_reviews.author: G.E.Coine

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, sturdy, ventilated
customer_reviews.text: Originally purchased a pair with Gortex. Feet got way too hot, so I purchased these. My go-to shoes for work. Love em.
customer_reviews.author: JeTurner

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market
customer_reviews.text: Best boot on the market. Hiked through the Colombian jungle with not. Very lite and breathable. Not waterproof, so make sure your wearing conditions will be dry.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Litzer

customer_reviews.title: comfortable but wont keep out fine sand and dust
customer_reviews.text: Like the fit and lightweight. Don't like that fine sand and dust easily goes through the mesh.
customer_reviews.author: saym

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes...the whole family loves Salomon shoes! Well made and comfortable 😄
customer_reviews.author: Lochner

customer_reviews.title: Great ankle support!
customer_reviews.text: Best hiking boot I’ve ever purchased. You can feel the breeze though these boots. My feet used to ache after 10+ hours on my feet. No pain great product!
customer_reviews.author: miles gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight boot!
customer_reviews.text: Super light with ankle support. This lacks the Gore-tex, which makes this boot as light as it is.
customer_reviews.author: MikeNOVA

customer_reviews.title: Breathable and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Honestly the best hiking shoe I have ever used. Great breathability and solid stability. They were recommended to me and I couldn’t be happier. I’ll buy the waterproof version next!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: Have had an issue with breathability. My feet sweat. These are so comfortable I can feel the breeze and the sturdiness of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: James A.

customer_reviews.title: Oustanding pair of boots!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! very comfortable! Standing all day is easy on your feet and back!
customer_reviews.author: JOE DIAZ

customer_reviews.title: Breathable. Perfect for long walking in the heat
customer_reviews.text: Very breathable and comfortable. No need to break these in definitely will be recommending these boots
customer_reviews.author: nicholas galarza

customer_reviews.title: Great Footwear for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Best fitting, most comfortable boot I have worn in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: EIIIIL

customer_reviews.title: Lightweigt and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I would've give 5stars except they took an extra 3 days to get to me! They fit well and are very breathable. A plus in the Salt Lake City summer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: these are breathable and perfect for the hot summer here in vegas
customer_reviews.text: they are so confortable. I also have a pair of the gortex version. these are breathable and perfect for the hot summer here in vegas.
customer_reviews.author: Neptali F.

customer_reviews.title: Size up 1/2 size.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a breathable, non-waterproof light hiker to keep my dogs from swimming around in a puddle of foot-funk and these delivered. Great boots, but go up a half size.
customer_reviews.author: damon wood

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Excellent multi use boot.
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They’re a perfect year round boot for hiking or everyday wear.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL ROUGHLEY

customer_reviews.title: Work boots
customer_reviews.text: Brought them for my husband he loves them they fit comfortably
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what he wanted .
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my husband he loves them. Fit perfect and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita long

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works well and they are holding up well I use them hard at work
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Cumber

customer_reviews.title: The best boot brand
customer_reviews.text: husband purchased these to replace same brand's boots that had worn out. He loves them so much, he decided to get same brand again. These boots fit the same, but the material is breathable and he likes them even more than the first pair.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany K.

product_meta.title: Salomon mens L40127400 X Ultra Mid 3 Aero
product_meta.description: Order your shoe x Ultra Mid 3 aero on the hardloop. fr shop a wide selection of Salomon products. Free shipping and FREE RETURN x Ultra Mid 3 aero - 's hiking shoes
feature_bullets: Great fit starts with Salomon's time-tested and refined last. Add an improved Sensifit system with a reinforced upper arm, and you get the best foothold possible, especially on the descents where you need it.

The Advanced Chassis, surrounded by foam cushioning for comfort, connects directly to the sole to stabilize your heel. The Advanced Chassis helps stabilize your heel, and it's surrounded by generous cushioning for maximum comfort on the trail.

Two different types of rubber are strategically placed on the sole for durability and more grip. Aggressive lugs in the heel area grab the terrain, giving you more control when you're moving along at a healthy clip.
